documents.document: @Strutty74 Now I'll struggle in to work! A woman has to get her priorities right. 👍
Bring on the Hibees! ❤❤❤❤❤⚽
@Tomdoggy @JamTarts Or phone /login times according to loyalty points? It's like groundhog day. Disappointing.
@Pistol1874 Probably not a good idea to mix with the Beecham tablets though... Will give that a miss.
@davidk_89 You're right but plane ticket bought and I was deputising for somebody else and didn't want to let anybody down Struggled on...
@Pistol1874 Very witty! Straight to my bed when I walked through the door but coughing so much can't sleep. Woe is… https://t.co/hORsGay6T9
Taxis, planes, trains, trams and buses. All negotiated when I'm virusy and shattered. My dedication and professiona… https://t.co/f6twREh3MY
Pet hate...people who state the obvious at meetings. At airport, folk on phones stating the .... Give it up. You're really not important.
Well done @IanMurrayMP Plan is to move back to Edinburgh South in next couple of years. I'll try and do it before… https://t.co/1prEC1wCW2
Personal reasons couldn't go tonight but I'm there in spirit. Well done my fellow citizens of Edinburgh. https://t.co/UdQsPtEnqm
God know I have no time for the SNP but saw this on Parliament tv. Reflects badly on Soames and anybody who thin… https://t.co/8YWWBQOxM4
@tynecastleroar1 I'm in Birmingham tomorrow for a meeting. Will now be checking my phone discreetly at the breaks!
@tynecastleroar1 You've been pretty spot on!
That was a bit sneaky. Thought we were getting another three! #greedy
Here we go again..... Hanging on a telephone queue....being told to wait on an internet queue. Flexi up the spout.… https://t.co/pPsYTBkqAQ
I complain about the "dumbing down" of British politics and then you read this written by the POTUS. 😒 https://t.co/bPZvp77vX9
@ianhorsburgh Me too! My task for Wednesday lunch time.
He's off. If he wasn't interested they would have been told. Go Craig. Escape while there's still hope for you. https://t.co/zXZITYhnsY
@jamtart18 @scottishchicp They're crawling out at the moment. Appear to be very confident too. I love when they're confident....❤⚽
@scottishchicp Assuming that because they're obsessed with us it's reciprocated. #deluded
If there are any new signings today skip the photo shoot and just get them on the training pitch asap. #hmfc
@galleonskip You think it would be getting aired at seven on a Friday night? SNP would have declared a national holiday for us to read it!
"Very nicely stated" - condescending prick. #maytrump
Get on with it. Scarf above head photo, training and good luck on Sunday...... https://t.co/Dnq1DbD4iW
Thursday stand update - not changed since 10.15pm last night! 😉
Cathro from 14 minutes in. Good interview. https://t.co/f9xssswb9p
@scottishchicp Really? I'm thinking maybe........
@JamboAngela Bring on the Hibees. ❤⚽
And can I just say ...Jamie Walker ❤⚽ Well done young man. If only we could clone your desire to win in a maroon jersey.
Our managers interview anyone? Point me in the direction please.
@MrsCupcake79 @KH5151 Hope he's found soon. Loads of kind people so if somebody sees him distressed they'll help.
Christ if he can score goals I'm in for ten euros...... https://t.co/ZXsih5Mnp2
Whwn I was seven I got the Burns certificate at school for reciting this! #BurnsDay https://t.co/EMr2iRJIr6
Think I'll run a sweep on how long he'll last. #hewont https://t.co/hJnRfOJPtY
Even the ones who voted for it? https://t.co/LpyXQPRXsx
Ticket bought for Wednesday. C'mon the Hearts. #optimistic
Your phone must have been going crazy @ClaireHammond !
@rohannemclean It was fab! Back on form. Enjoy! x
@rohannemclean My fingers are mute! x
Homeland! Please be better than last season.
The pound against the Euro is not helping escapes out the country. Everything is so much more expensive. #notfair
@davidstoker_lfc Yep. However a team coming of a three week break and a defence that's never played together we will be better on Wednesday.
@LJ_1874 Certainly was not. Plus it looks as though he's found a plan B!
Pondering though. Who's got more chance of beating Hibs? Us or Gary Locke? #decentrecord
Just in after yoga and all destressed then see the next round! Bring on the Celtic B team assuming we beat Raith Rovers!
Just as well I hadn't bought the haggis yet. Plans cancelled. Cheers Hearts.
@Lynny_5_1 It's been like this all season and last season too. Bullied and slow. What a combination. 😔
Still as slow as a week in jail when we get the ball.
Game of two halves etc etc
When are we ever going to dictate a game? Get bullied and closed down.
Anytime you want to get back into this game Hearts......
I'm not one for slagging off Gary but he's got a plan B???????
Thank God for Jamie. Now let's kick on.
@maroonajambo My hero. Up there with Robbo, Skacel and Colquhoun.
@shazxraz Thank God it's not just me! I'm useless at watching Hearts on the telly! C'mon the Hearts. ❤⚽
https://t.co/rQ2OBHmrTY Google I love you! Salmon it is. I can do that!
Help! If you have haggis as starter anybody any suggestions what to have as a main course? It needs to be easy #notjamieoliver #clueless
@davidstoker_lfc You need to go for a tour before they knock it down. Realism will overtake sentimentalism. You in Section F?
I promised myself I wouldn't tweet any more about Trump but...... 😔 https://t.co/J3oBfwqdGr
@LJ_1874 😁 We all make compromises at times. Hope she enjoys spending his money!
When you're asked to dance by someone you don't know but you don't want to be rude and then nearly break your back… https://t.co/M3g96WFNml
If ever a man was looking for a pay off...... perfect example. https://t.co/EGgdQHZ1vd
@AliOnTheRun1 Michelle's face is probably saying it all.
Michelle wondering how long she has to stand there and prays they've got the car engine running.
For fuck sake. This is even worse than I imagined.
Barack has got his poker face on but Michelle is just not hiding it at all. 😁
@captainjamtart 😁It's all about the maroon.
@Mac9974 Leaving out the simple fact a sex pest and racist should not be President of the United States he's out his depth and won't last.
The only consolation is that he will never last four years. Don't know why but he'll be out of office before his term is up.
Class and decency from Hillary. Trump supporters won't understand it. https://t.co/uxsUfwwTIB
His family look gormless. That's being kind.
Michelle in maroon. Sure Obama wore a maroon tie at his inauguration. They'll have time to get to the see the new stand at Tynecastle now. 😉
A man who sexually abused women is going to be President of the United States. It's beyond belief and so very depre… https://t.co/tMZL9jDoJJ
"Dignity and virtue" Exactly what he brought to the role. https://t.co/tLtyb6t4GT
I could weep at this. It's hard to believe these people have a platform not only at home but in world politics. https://t.co/cxaAxfi07c
@Pistol1874 He was. He's changed though. I stopped buying the Scotland on Sunday because of the bile he wrote about Hearts fans.
"This is the place" https://t.co/a0OGi8FzIm
@Pistol1874 Must win on Sunday? There will be folk very unhappy if we lose but his job is safe. Maybe next January if we're emptied then...
@Pistol1874 Agreed. Interesting that he has brought in experienced players. Exactly what we missed against Aberdeen.
Hearts support the only one in football to voice their opinion on the team. Total over reaction by the media.
Finally a journalist mentions the sub standard performances prior to the Rangers game. Well done @BBCTomEnglish
@JanetMinto Yep sad and proud! Take my dad for a run in car on a Thursday morning so it's good for a detour. Was a hub of industry today.
Checking up. #tynecastle https://t.co/1bY2Yuevgj

Been saying for ages we could have the best forwards in the league but we won't score unless our midfield get the ball to them.
@Frankiejambo That was my thoughts. Word for word!
Considering buying a tartan rug for the journey back. #freezing
@ortonioni On the train to Manchester! Bagel consumed.
The bagel shop was open even at this ungodly hour. Today has started well.

Aww. If blue Monday is getting you down I defy you not to smile. https://t.co/wwEdTP40dG
@Lapeacock80 @Strutty74 @northumbriana I checked where it was because my grandad was at Elphinstone. Twitter can be wonderful at times!
